about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Modern Apartments In Center Of Athens
about.description: The building is located in the heart of Athens. It is close to the Embassy of the United States, the University of Athens, important hospitals, hotels, embassies, many government structures, and metro station. It is only 7 minutes from Syntagma Square and only 13 minutes from Acropolis by car.
